alert.note: Alert for Harding; Quay; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:00PM MDT until July 08 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... West central Quay County in east central New Mexico... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 459 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Conchas Dam, or 17 miles southwest of Mosquero, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bell Ranch. This includes State Road 104 between Mile Markers 80 and 99. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
